text:
FOSSA (https://fossa.io) - SF | Onsite only

FOSSA's code analysis tooling helps teams become successful with open source.

Over 3000 open source projects (Kubernetes, Webpack, Terraform, ESLint) and companies (Docker, Tesla, Mapbox, Hashicorp) rely on FOSSA's tools in their critical deployment paths to automate license compliance, vulnerability management, software inventory and more.

FOSSA is an early-stage company backed by Bain Capital Ventures with affiliate angels including Marc Benioff (Salesforce), Steve Chen (YouTube), Amr Awadallah (Cloudera), Jaan Tallin (Skype) and Justin Mateen (Tinder).

https://fossa.io/careers/
